meanings.definition: In an exponential manner or fashion.
meanings.sent1: The population of rabbits grew exponentially in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The virus spread exponentially throughout the community.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter rose exponentially in the oven, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement for the concert grew exponentially, like a balloon filling with air.
meanings.sent5: The flames of the campfire rose exponentially, lighting up the night sky.
